title: Talking Picture Magazine
additional-note: The earliest renewed contribution recorded here is the only one we found specifically mentioning this publication in the Contributions to Periodicals section of the CCE.  It is possible that renewals for scripts or movies with content appearing in the magazine may have also been filed under Drama or Motion Pictures sections of the CCE, and might or might not mention this publication.  We have not systematically surveyed renewals in those sections.
